title: QX-IR v1 Circuit Schema
description: A schema for defining a quantum circuit.

qxir_version.description: The version of the QX-IR specification.

n_qubits.description: The number of qubits in the circuit.

name.description: The name of the gate or operation.

qubits.description: A list of qubit indices the operation acts on.

params.description: A list of parameters for the operation (e.g., rotation angles).
